Package emissary.core.channels

Class AbstractSeekableByteChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • emissary.core.channels.AbstractSeekableByteChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, ByteChannel, Channel, ReadableByteChannel, SeekableByteChannel, WritableByteChannel
    public abstract class AbstractSeekableByteChannel
extends Object
implements SeekableByteChannel
    Core implementation of the SeekableByteChannel interface

                                   throws IOException

      • size
